Author: Kouyne
Text: Don't think so. The only other doctor they've let me see was a temp doctor (aka she's gonna leave soon, just filling in) and she wasn't interested in giving me my antivan refills after I said I needed them (the psych i saw prescribed them to help me eat) and refused to listen when I mentioned my BPD symptoms were getting worse. They just don't care. It took a lot to actually seek help but it takes them months to do anything if they even bother to believe you.

Author: tofu_snob
Text: Do you think you can book an appointment with a new doctor? I'm so sorry she invalidated you and didn't consider discussing your prior psychiatry or eating disorder diagnosis. :(
